sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container>
    <v-row class="d-flex justify-center">
      <v-col
        md="4"
        sm="8"
        xs="12"
        :class="{
          'px-7': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
          'py-4': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
          'py-1': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
        }"
      >
        <v-form>
          <o-text
            sm
            semi-bold
            class="mb-3"
          >
            {{ ONE_MORE_THING }}
          </o-text>
          <header-title class="pb-4">
            {{ SHIPPING_ZIP_CODE_TITLE }}
          </header-title>
          <o-text-field
            :title="ZIP_CODE_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE"
            id="zipCode"
            @onChange="onChange($event)"
            @onKeyEnter="lookupOrder"
            @onPaste="onPaste($event)"
            :placeholder="ZIP_CODE_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE"
          />
          <action-button
            @click="lookupOrder"
            :class="{
              'mt-n3': $vuetify.breakpoint.smAndDown,
              'mt-n2': $vuetify.breakpoint.mdAndUp,
            }"
            :disabled="isDisabled"
            :loading="isLoading"
            primary-color
            block
            x-large
          >
            {{ LOOKUP_ORDER }}
          </action-button>
        </v-form>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapGetters } from 'vuex'
import { FETCH_ORDER, GET_CONFIG } from '@/store/constants.js'
import OTextField from '@/components/molecules/OTextField.vue'
import ActionButton from '@/components/atoms/ActionButton.vue'
import { ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP } from 'branding/strings.json'
import OText from '@/components/atoms/OText.vue'
import HeaderTitle from '@/components/molecules/HeaderTitle.vue'
import { getIsGift, getGiftEmail } from '@/store/sessionStorage.js'

export default {
  components: {
    OTextField,
    ActionButton,
    OText,
    HeaderTitle
  },
  data () {
    return {
      zipCode: '',
      isDisabled: true,
      showReturnGift: false,
      ONE_MORE_THING: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.ONE_MORE_THING,
      SHIPPING_ZIP_CODE_TITLE: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.SHIPPING_ZIP_CODE_TITLE,
      ZIP_CODE_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.ZIP_CODE_TEXT_FIELD_TITLE,
      ENTER_ZIP_CODE_PLACEHOLDER: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.ENTER_ZIP_CODE_PLACEHOLDER,
      LOOKUP_ORDER: ZIP_CODE_LOOKUP.LOOKUP_ORDER,
      isGiftAllowed: false,
      isGiftReturn: getIsGift(),
      state_Email: getGiftEmail()
    }
  },
  computed: {
    ...mapGetters({
      order: 'order/order',
      isLoading: 'order/isLoading',
      state_orderId: 'ui/orderId',
      state_zipCode: 'ui/zipCode',
      config: 'returns/config'
    })
  },
  mounted () {
    this.zipCode = ''

    if (!this.config) {
      this.$store
        .dispatch('order/' + GET_CONFIG, null)
        .then((response) => {
          if (response) {
            this.isGiftAllowed = response?.gift_returns_allowed
            this.customerSupportContact = response.retailer_info?.customer_support_contact
          }
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          console.error({ err })
        })
    } else {
      this.customerSupportContact = this.config?.retailer_info?.customer_support_contact
    }
  },
  methods: {
    onChange (event) {
      this.validate(event.target.value)
    },
    onPaste (event) {
      this.validate(event.clipboardData.getData('text/plain'))
    },
    validate (value) {
      this.zipCode = value
      var isValidZipCode = false
      if (value) {
        isValidZipCode = this.isValidZip(value)
      }
      this.isDisabled = !isValidZipCode
    },
    isValidZip (zipCode) {
      const zipcodeRex = /[0-9]/g
      const checkIsZipcode = zipcodeRex.test(zipCode)
      return zipCode.length === 5 && checkIsZipcode
    },
    async lookupOrder () {
      if (!this.isValidZip(this.zipCode)) {
        return
      }
      let params = {
        order_id: this.state_orderId,
        zip_code: this.zipCode
      }
      if (this.isGiftReturn && this.state_Email) {
        params = { ...params, email: this.state_Email }
      }
      this.$store
        .dispatch('order/' + FETCH_ORDER, params)
        .then((response) => {
          this.$store.commit('ui/updateZipCode', this.zipCode)

          if (response) {
            const orderHash =
              response && response != null
                ? response.order_hash
                : this.order.orderId
            this.$router.push('/orders/' + orderHash)
          } else {
            this.$router.push('/orderandzipcode')
          }
        })
        .catch((err) => {
          this.$store.commit('ui/updateZipCode', this.zipCode)
          this.$router.push('/orderandzipcode')
          console.error({ err })
        })
    },
    showReturnaGift () {
      this.$router.push({
        name: 'returngift'
      })
    }
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped>
.container {
  padding-top: 60px;
}
</style>
